hero.title: What Our Customers Say
hero.subtitle: Over 100 five-star reviews from homeowners and businesses across Ireland. Don't just take our word for it.

reviews.name: Seán O'Brien
reviews.text: Brilliant service from start to finish. The team were professional, tidy, and explained everything clearly. Our electricity bills have dropped by over 60% since installation. Couldn't recommend them enough!

reviews.name: Mary Fitzgerald
reviews.text: We were unsure about solar at first, but Green-House Renewables made the whole process so easy. They handled the SEAI grant application, and the installation was done in just one day. Absolutely delighted with the results.

reviews.name: Patrick Walsh
reviews.text: Had solar panels and a Sigenergy battery installed. The monitoring app is fantastic — I can see exactly how much energy we're generating and saving. The team were excellent throughout.

reviews.name: Aoife Murphy
reviews.text: From the initial survey to the final handover, everything was handled with care. The panels look great on our roof and we're already seeing significant savings. Highly recommend Green-House Renewables.

reviews.name: Dermot Kavanagh
reviews.text: We had an EV charger and solar panels installed at the same time. Now we charge our car for free with solar energy! The savings are incredible. Professional team, great communication.

reviews.name: Ciara Brennan
reviews.text: As a business owner, I was looking to reduce our energy costs. Green-House Renewables designed a system that cut our bills in half. The installation caused zero disruption to our operations. Top class.

reviews.name: Tomás Ryan
reviews.text: Excellent experience all round. Competitive pricing, quality panels, and the lads who did the install were friendly and professional. Our neighbours have since booked with them too!

reviews.name: Niamh Doyle
reviews.text: The battery storage has been a game changer. We barely use any grid electricity now. Green-House Renewables explained all the options clearly and helped us choose the right system for our home.

reviews.name: Michael Kelly
reviews.text: We got quotes from five different companies. Green-House Renewables were the most knowledgeable and their quote was very competitive. The installation quality is superb. Very happy customers.
